title: Pay wall and Registration Wall Pocket and Search Results
content:
Look, I love the pocket topics that show up for me to read, and I like your browser. But, for the love of all that is decent, how can I stop receiving search results and topics to read in new browser tabs that require me to spread my information to yet another database, or pay straight up to access.

Let me cut to the chase. I will not ever, ever, pay or register for any of these sites. So whatever income is generated by depending on me to do so will never, ever, come your way. How can I stop this waste of my time and productivity and further degradation of my privacy?
creator: NomadicSpirit4

title: Remove bookmarks and add-ons etc from a second computer
content: I have signed into my Firefox account on my parents computer in order to see my bookmarks & have saved passwords, etc easily found, signed into & used. Sync is off but after I sign out bookmarks & password still on this computer. I don't want to remove these bookmarks & passwords from my Firefox account on my home desktop or my phone - just from this one computer. Research I found say a Firefox account not for this "function" - but now that I've done it is there NO way to remove it & not have to start from scratch & thus lose all the saved data, extensions, etc.???
creator: piikea
